00034 #include "Constraints.hh"
00035 
00036 #include <PLASMA/RuleInstance.hh>
00037 #include <PLASMA/Token.hh>
00038 #include <PLASMA/TokenVariable.hh>
00039 
00040 EUROPA::TokenId TREX::europa::details::parent_token(EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId const &var) {
00041   EUROPA::EntityId e = var->parent();
00042 
00043   if( e.isId() ) {
00044     if( EUROPA::TokenId::convertable(e) )
00045       return e;
00046     
00047     if( EUROPA::RuleInstanceId::convertable(e) ) {
00048       EUROPA::RuleInstanceId r(e);
00049       return r->getToken();
00050     }
00051   }
00052   return EUROPA::TokenId::noId();
00053 }

00059 /*
00060  * class TREX::europa::ReactorConstraint
00061  */
00062 
00063 ReactorConstraint::ReactorConstraint(EUROPA::LabelStr const &name, 
00064                                  EUROPA::LabelStr const &propagatorName,
00065                                  EUROPA::ConstraintEngineId const &cstrEngine,
00066                                  std::vector<EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId> const &vars)
00067   :EUROPA::Constraint(name, propagatorName, cstrEngine, vars), m_assembly(NULL) {
00068 }
00069 
00070 Assembly &ReactorConstraint::assembly() {
00071   if( NULL==m_assembly ) {
00072     EUROPA::PropagatorId prop = getPropagator();
00073     if( EUROPA::Id<ReactorPropagator>::convertable(prop) ) {
00074       EUROPA::Id<ReactorPropagator> me(prop);
00075       m_assembly = me->m_assembly;
00076     } else 
00077       throw EuropaException("Constraint "+getName().toString()+" is attached to "
00078                          +getPropagator()->getName().toString()
00079                          +" which is not a reactor propagator");
00080   }
00081   return *m_assembly;
00082 }

00085 /*
00086  * class TREX::europa::CheckExternal
00087  */
00088 CheckExternal::CheckExternal(EUROPA::LabelStr const &name, 
00089                           EUROPA::LabelStr const &propagatorName,
00090                           EUROPA::ConstraintEngineId const &cstrEngine,
00091                           std::vector<EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId> const &variables) 
00092   :ReactorConstraint(name, propagatorName, cstrEngine, variables), m_obj(NULL) {
00093   if( m_variables.size()==2 ) {
00094     m_obj = &(getCurrentDomain(m_variables[1]));
00095   } else {
00096     if( m_variables.size()!=1 )
00097       throw EuropaException("Constraint "+name.toString()+" require 1 or 2 arguments");
00098     EUROPA::TokenId tok = details::parent_token(m_variables[0]);
00099     if( tok.isId() ) {
00100       m_obj = &(getCurrentDomain(tok->getObject()));
00101     }
00102   }
00103   m_test = &(getCurrentDomain(m_variables[0]));
00104 }
00105 
00106 void CheckExternal::handleExecute() {
00107 
00108   if( NULL!=m_obj ) {
00109     Assembly &r = assembly();
00110     EUROPA::DataTypeId type = m_obj->getDataType();
00111 
00112     if( r.schema()->isA(type->getName(), Assembly::TREX_TIMELINE) ) {      
00113       EUROPA::ObjectDomain const &dom(*m_obj);
00114       std::list<EUROPA::ObjectId> exts, n_exts, vals = dom.makeObjectList();
00115 
00116       for(std::list<EUROPA::ObjectId>::const_iterator i=vals.begin(); 
00117          vals.end()!=i; ++i) {
00118        if( r.isExternal(*i) )
00119          exts.push_back(*i);
00120        else 
00121          n_exts.push_back(*i);
00122       }
00123       if( !exts.empty() ) {
00124        if( n_exts.empty() ) {
00125          m_test->intersect(true, true);
00126          debugMsg("trex:cstr:external", "AFTER "
00127                  <<"\n\ttest "<<m_test->toString());
00128          return;
00129        } else if( m_test->isSingleton() ) {
00130          std::auto_ptr<EUROPA::ObjectDomain> tmp;
00131          if( m_test->isMember(true) )
00132            tmp.reset(new EUROPA::ObjectDomain(type, exts));
00133          else 
00134            tmp.reset(new EUROPA::ObjectDomain(type, n_exts));
00135          m_obj->intersect(*tmp);
00136          return;
00137        }
00138       }
00139     }
00140   } 
00141   m_test->intersect(false, false);
00142 }
00143 
00144 /*
00145  * class TREX::europa::CheckInternal
00146  */
00147 CheckInternal::CheckInternal(EUROPA::LabelStr const &name, 
00148                           EUROPA::LabelStr const &propagatorName,
00149                           EUROPA::ConstraintEngineId const &cstrEngine,
00150                           std::vector<EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId> const &variables) 
00151   :ReactorConstraint(name, propagatorName, cstrEngine, variables) {
00152   if( m_variables.size()==2 ) {
00153     m_obj = &(getCurrentDomain(m_variables[1]));
00154   } else {
00155     if( m_variables.size()!=1 )
00156       throw EuropaException("Constraint "+name.toString()+" require 1 or 2 arguments");
00157     EUROPA::TokenId tok = details::parent_token(m_variables[0]);
00158     if( tok.isId() ) {
00159       m_obj = &(getCurrentDomain(tok->getObject()));
00160     }
00161   }
00162   m_test = &(getCurrentDomain(m_variables[0]));
00163 }
00164 
00165 void CheckInternal::handleExecute() {
00166   if( NULL!=m_obj ) {
00167     Assembly &r = assembly();
00168     EUROPA::DataTypeId type = m_obj->getDataType();
00169 
00170     if( r.schema()->isA(type->getName(), Assembly::TREX_TIMELINE) ) {      
00171       EUROPA::ObjectDomain const &dom(*m_obj);
00172       std::list<EUROPA::ObjectId> ints, n_ints, vals = dom.makeObjectList();
00173 
00174       for(std::list<EUROPA::ObjectId>::const_iterator i=vals.begin(); vals.end()!=i; ++i) {
00175        if( r.isInternal(*i) )
00176          ints.push_back(*i);
00177        else 
00178          n_ints.push_back(*i);
00179       }
00180       if( !ints.empty() ) {
00181        if( n_ints.empty() ) {
00182          m_test->intersect(true, true);
00183          return;
00184        } else if( m_test->isSingleton() ) {
00185          std::auto_ptr<EUROPA::ObjectDomain> tmp;
00186          if( m_test->isMember(true) )
00187            tmp.reset(new EUROPA::ObjectDomain(type, ints));
00188          else 
00189            tmp.reset(new EUROPA::ObjectDomain(type, n_ints));
00190          m_obj->intersect(*tmp);
00191          return;
00192        }
00193       }
00194     }
00195   }
00196   m_test->intersect(false, false);
00197 }
00198 
00199 /*
00200  * class TREX::europa::Bind
00201  */
00202 Bind::Bind(EUROPA::LabelStr const &name, 
00203           EUROPA::LabelStr const &propagatorName,
00204           EUROPA::ConstraintEngineId const &cstrEngine,
00205           std::vector<EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId> const &variables)
00206   :EUROPA::Constraint(name, propagatorName, cstrEngine, variables) {
00207   if( m_variables.size()!=2 )
00208     throw EuropaException("constraint "+name.toString()+" requires exactly 2 arguments");
00209   m_target = m_variables[0];
00210   m_default = m_variables[1];
00211   // Check that types are compatibles
00212   if( !m_target->getDataType()->isAssignableFrom(m_default->getDataType()) ) 
00213     throw EuropaException("constraint "+name.toString()
00214                        +" requires that the 2nd argument type is convertible to"
00215                        " the first argement type");
00216 }
00217 
00218 bool Bind::guardSatisfied() const {
00219   return m_target->isActive() && m_default->lastDomain().isSingleton() && 
00220     !m_target->lastDomain().isSingleton();
00221 }
00222 
00223 void Bind::handleExecute() {
00224   if( guardSatisfied() ) {
00225     EUROPA::Domain &domain = getCurrentDomain(m_target);
00226     debugMsg("trex:bind", "BEFORE "<<m_target->getName().toString()
00227             <<"="<<m_target->toString()
00228             <<" "<<m_default->toString());
00229     if( domain.intersects(m_default->lastDomain()) ) {
00230       domain.intersect(m_default->lastDomain());
00231     } else {
00232       EUROPA::edouble lb, ub, val = m_default->lastDomain().getSingletonValue();
00233       domain.getBounds(lb, ub);
00234       EUROPA::edouble dlo = std::abs(lb-val), dhi = std::abs(ub-val);
00235       if( dhi<dlo )
00236        domain.intersect(ub, ub);
00237       else
00238        domain.intersect(lb, lb);
00239     }
00240     debugMsg("trex:bind", "AFTER "<<m_target->getName().toString()
00241             <<"="<<m_target->toString()
00242             <<" "<<m_default->toString());
00243   }
00244 }
